// Plug One.1 (Adept)
//notes: (???  ???): AVOID: Full Bore and Charge Time MW.

For barrel, anything with stability bonuses (chambered compensator -- top pick, corkscrew, and fluted), or even arrowhead-break for the huge bump in recoil direction.

For magazine, Liquid Coils is god-tier for PvP activities, and Particle Repeater makes a good alternative. Enhanced battery, paired with Under Pressure can also increase the perk benefit to boost stability and acc at 4 in the mag vs 3, which could be very useful in PvP when you are running scav mods that inherently undermine something like Under Pressure, especially when you carry ammo over from round to round.

Recommended MW: Stability (alternatively, Range)
dimwishlist:item=534775659&perks=3661387068,1687452232,1645158859,1799762209
dimwishlist:item=534775659&perks=534775659,1687452232,1645158859,1799762209
dimwishlist:item=534775659&perks=534775659,1687452232,1645158859,1799762209
dimwishlist:item=534775659&perks=839105230,1687452232,1645158859,1799762209
dimwishlist:item=534775659&perks=3661387068,2680121939,1645158859,1799762209
dimwishlist:item=534775659&perks=534775659,2680121939,1645158859,1799762209
dimwishlist:item=534775659&perks=534775659,2680121939,1645158859,1799762209
dimwishlist:item=534775659&perks=839105230,2680121939,1645158859,1799762209
dimwishlist:item=534775659&perks=3661387068,3868766766,1645158859,1799762209

// Chrysura Melo
//notes:UserComponent: Recommended MW: Handling/Stability ... We now have infinite primary ammo, but we still have a limited mag size. In high-end content you might be pumping a full mag, or more, into an enemy with this gun. This results in very little proc rates for dragonfly (unless you are cleaning up) or kill-based -- let alone precision-based -- perk usage. FTTC could boost dragonfly usefulness due to their precision synergy, and frenzy will always be a great perk in high-end content bc it doesn't require a kill. I opted away from accurized for the mag and focused on a larger mag size to synergize with FTTC, or steady rounds to boost overrall stability (making those crit kills a little easier to make).
dimwishlist:item=1337707096&perks=839105230,3177308360,1354429876,2848615171
dimwishlist:item=1337707096&perks=1840239774,3177308360,1354429876,2848615171
dimwishlist:item=1337707096&perks=839105230,1087426260,1354429876,2848615171
dimwishlist:item=1337707096&perks=1840239774,1087426260,1354429876,2848615171
dimwishlist:item=1337707096&perks=839105230,106909392,1354429876,2848615171
dimwishlist:item=1337707096&perks=1840239774,106909392,1354429876,2848615171
dimwishlist:item=1337707096&perks=839105230,3177308360,1354429876,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=1337707096&perks=1840239774,3177308360,1354429876,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=1337707096&perks=839105230,1087426260,1354429876,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=1337707096&perks=1840239774,1087426260,1354429876,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=1337707096&perks=839105230,106909392,1354429876,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=1337707096&perks=1840239774,106909392,1354429876,4104185692

// Wolftone Draw
//notes:UserComponent: Recommended MW: Draw Time/Accuracy ... Archer's Tempo will synergize well with Adagio, but Shoot to Loot will probably save your ass in a GM if you need to run a bow and run out of Special/Heavy. If this bow was in the kinetic slot, Shoot to Loot could be more useful when combo'd with Merciless, for example.
dimwishlist:item=3472875143&perks=852209214,3827198035,201365942,3673922083
dimwishlist:item=3472875143&perks=2801223209,3827198035,201365942,3673922083
